title: Music for Megaliths
comments: Has a few dents on the gatefold, but otherwise in great condition. Comes with original stickers

title: Adaptation and Survival
comments: Has a few dents on the gatefold, but otherwise in great condition. Comes with original stickers

title: Silver
comments: Has a few dents on the gatefold, but otherwise in great condition. Comes with original stickers

title: Ultraviolet
comments: Has a few dents on the gatefold, but otherwise in great condition. Comes with original stickers

title: The Red Album
comments: Has a few dents on the gatefold, but otherwise in great condition. Comes with original stickers

title: Union of Worlds
comments: Signed by A.E. Ferrerra himself. Comes with ticket stubs of show of purchase. MINT CONDITION!

title: Liminal Migration
comments: Bought this at one of Steve Moore's shows. Not exactly my thing, so my loss is your gain!

title: Beyond the Black Rainbow
comments: Found this album in a used record bin in Victoria, B.C. Only willing to sell if you're willing to pay this much

title: Moogmentum
comments: Has some slight stretches of the cellophane wrap. Bought it at the Moog factory in Asheville, N.C.

title: Silver Side Up
comments: I own this so I can take out my frustrations on it. Horrible band!

title: Banker's Hill
comments: Picked this up at their last show in San Diego before lockdown!

title: Rosalie Cunningham
comments: Amazing artist! I have an extra copy of her self-titled album up for sale. Still in the cellophane!

title: Benzaiten
comments: Super rare orange and green splatter color vinyl sold only at the Roadburn Festival in 2019. Amazing modern jazz fusion.

title: Adhesive
comments: Friend left this CD in my car and moved away. It's kinda abrasive and glitchy EDM but still weirdly groovy.
